name: TRAVEL TRACKER
description: An application to let users see their previous trips and spent amount. It also allows users to get estimates for future trips as well as booking a new trip. This a solo project calculated at about 50 hours of total work time.

name: ColoRandom
description: A random color palettes application where a user can lock their favorite colors within the pallet and can also save their favorite pallettes. This was a group project with four team members. We calculated the project time to be around 40 hours total.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: A version of Tic-Tac-Toe with a burrito and taco. A fun interactive game where the user can play against a friend on the same computer and they can switch characters after each round.
